description: Baked Sweet Potato Fries with Vegan Chipotle Ranch. Easy Crisp Sweet Potato Fries served with dairy free ranch. Vegan Appetizer Recipe Glutenfree Soyfree
name: Baked Sweet Potato Fries with Chipotle Ranch
recipeIngredient: 2 medium to large Sweet Potatoes (peeled and thinly sliced into thin sticks)
1 tbsp starch such as arrowroot (cornstarch or use any flour)
more salt for seasoning as needed
1/2 cup ground cashew or soaked cashews
a very generous dash of black pepper
1-2 tsp ranch seasoning (see notes) (equal amounts of dried parsley, dill, thyme, garlic powder and onion powder.)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F / 220oc. Peel and chop the sweet potatoes.
Place in a very large bowl or zip lock. Add the starch, cover the bowl with a plate and dance away. Or shake the ziplock or use spoons to mix.
Once the sweet potatoes are evenly coated, add oil, herbs and spices through salt and mix well.
Spread the sweet potato sticks evenly in one layer on 1 or 2 baking sheets.

Bake at 425 degrees F / 220oc for 18 to 22 minutes. the sweet potatoes should be cooked through and start to get brown edges and spots. Broil for half to 1 minute to brown. Let the fries sit for 2 minutes on the sheet before transferring to a serving bowl or plate. Season with salt, black pepper and powdered nutritional yeast and serve while still warm hot. the fries get softer when they cool.
Serve with chipotle ranch, plain ranch or dip of choice or ketchup.
